name: Somnium
description:
Explore surreal dimensions, each with different atmospheres and environments. Meet interesting characters. Solve puzzles and mysteries.





Become a dragon's best friend and give it any name you want. Set your enemies on fire and fight huge bosses.





Steal the hearts of girls from different dimensions and romance with them. But it won't be as easy as you think!





Need more words?





Play fun, different types of mini-games scattered throughout the chapters.





Face challenging platforming elements in levels full of traps and dangers. Complete 44 different in-game achievements, each carefully designed, and 7 other Steam-exclusive achievements.





Collect story pieces throughout your adventure that will take you to different dimensions. Reach the Dark Tower to find the answers you seek.



KEY FEATURES

- 10+ hours of gameplay.
- Fun interactions or interesting events that can surprise the player at every corner of the game world.
- Romance scenes.
- Dark humor.
- Boss fights.
- The style of the game changes as you progress through the chapters.
- 25+ music tracks throughout of chapters.
- Fully voiced dialogues.
- 3 different possible endings.
- Mini-games, in-game achievement system.
- Slap Shrump!

And much more...
